thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MediNavi: To Post Extraordinary Impairment Loss Of EUR 162 Thousand On Intangible Assets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MediNavi: To Post Extraordinary Impairment Loss Of EUR 162 Thousand On Intangible Assets
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - MEDINAVI AG:
* CURRENTLY SEES FY EARNINGS BEFORE TAXES OF APPROX EUR -1,000, AND TURNOVER OF APPROX. EUR 344,000 FOR MEDIKOMPASS GMBH (NOT FOR THE WHOLE COMPANY)
* MEDIKOMPASS GMBH WILL NOT MEET SALES AND EARNINGS FORECASTS ANNOUNCED IN AD HOC ANNOUNCEMENT OF 25.04.2017
* TO POST AN EXTRAORDINARY IMPAIRMENT LOSS OF EUR 162 THOUSAND ON INTANGIBLE ASSETS
* FOR THIS REASON, THE NET LOSS FOR 2017 OF MEDINAVI AG WILL BE CORRESPONDINGLY HIGHER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
